sections.label: SMART Solutions for Preschools
sections.description:
CommonTown was at the ECDA Early Childhood Conference 2016 (ECC 2016), held at Suntec City Convention Centre, from 30th September to 1st October 2016! During this conference, we showcased two of our main products - the Qoqolo pre-school management system, and the Dudu Personalised Chinese Learning System.

CommonTown was shortlisted as one of six vendors for the SMART Solutions for Preschools initiative, which aims to encourage preschools in Singapore to adopt IT solutions to improve productivity and facilitate administrative tasks in preschools. As a part of this initiative, we were given the opportunity to introduce Qoqolo, our pre-school management system, to many preschool educators at ECC 2016. Check out our video to find out more about how Qoqolo can help preschools to improve productivity!

To find out more about the SMART Solutions initiative, click here.

If your preschool is interested to find out more about how to purchase Qoqolo, drop us an e-mail at biz@commontown.com, or give us a call at +65 6848-8900!
